00087 void CKalman::Predict()
00088 {
00089      //FIXME cambiar para anadir el control
00090   CvMat* control=0;
00091   /* update the state */
00092   /* x'(k) = A*x(k) */
00093 
00094   cvMatMulAdd( pKalman->transition_matrix, pKalman->state_post, 0, pKalman->state_pre );
00095 
00096   if( control && pKalman->CP > 0 )
00097     {
00098       /* x'(k) = x'(k) + B*u(k) */
00099       cvMatMulAdd( pKalman->control_matrix, control, pKalman->state_pre, pKalman->state_pre );
00100     }
00101   /* update error covariance matrices */
00102 
00103   /* temp1 = A*P(k) */
00104   cvMatMulAdd( pKalman->transition_matrix, pKalman->error_cov_post, 0, pKalman->temp1 );
00105 
00106   /* P'(k) = temp1*At + Q */
00107 
00108   cvGEMM( pKalman->temp1, pKalman->transition_matrix, 1, pKalman->process_noise_cov, 1,
00109                    pKalman->error_cov_pre, CV_GEMM_B_T );
00110 
00111 }
00112 void CKalman::Predict_FAST()
00113 {
00114   //FIXME cambiar para anadir el control
00115   CvMat* control=0;
00116   /* update the state */
00117   /* x'(k) = A*x(k) */
00118   CvMat *A_, *post, *pre;
00119   A_=cvCreateMatHeader(pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00120   post=cvCreateMatHeader(pModel->getStateNum(),1,CV_32FC1);
00121   pre=cvCreateMatHeader(pModel->getStateNum(),1,CV_32FC1);
00122 
00123   cvGetSubRect( pKalman->transition_matrix,A_,cvRect(0,0,pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum()));
00124   cvGetSubRect( pKalman->state_post,post,cvRect(0,0,1,pModel->getStateNum()));
00125   cvGetSubRect( pKalman->state_pre,pre,cvRect(0,0,1,pModel->getStateNum()));
00126 
00127   cout<<"he llegado a en medio"<<endl;
00128   //  cvMatMulAdd( pKalman->transition_matrix, pKalman->state_post, 0, pKalman->state_pre );
00129   cvCopy(pKalman->state_post,pKalman->state_pre);
00130   cvMatMul( A_, post, pre);
00131   cout<<"he llegado a en medio2"<<endl;
00132   cvReleaseMatHeader(&A_);
00133   cvReleaseMatHeader(&post);
00134   cvReleaseMatHeader(&pre);
00135 
00136   if( control && pKalman->CP > 0 )
00137     {
00138       /* x'(k) = x'(k) + B*u(k) */
00139       cvMatMulAdd( pKalman->control_matrix, control, pKalman->state_pre, pKalman->state_pre );
00140     }
00141   /* update error covariance matrices */
00142 
00143   /* temp1 = A*P(k) */
00144   CvMat  *P_ ,*temp1_,*Q_,*P_pre,*P_21,*P_12,*P_21_pre,*P_12_pre;
00145   A_=cvCreateMatHeader(pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00146   P_=cvCreateMatHeader(pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00147   temp1_=cvCreateMatHeader(pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00148   Q_=cvCreateMatHeader(pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00149   P_pre=cvCreateMatHeader(pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00150   P_21=cvCreateMatHeader(pModel->getStateNum(),pKalman->DP-pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00151   P_12=cvCreateMatHeader(pKalman->DP-pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00152   P_21_pre=cvCreateMatHeader(pModel->getStateNum(),pKalman->DP-pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00153   P_12_pre=cvCreateMatHeader(pKalman->DP-pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00154 
00155   cvGetSubRect( pKalman->transition_matrix,A_,cvRect(0,0,pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum()));
00156   cvGetSubRect( pKalman->error_cov_post,P_,cvRect(0,0,pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum()));
00157   cvGetSubRect( pKalman->process_noise_cov,Q_,cvRect(0,0,pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum()));
00158   cvGetSubRect( pKalman->temp1,temp1_,cvRect(0,0,pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum()));
00159   cvGetSubRect( pKalman->error_cov_pre,P_pre,cvRect(0,0,pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum()));

00164 
00165   cout<<"he llegado a en medio3"<<endl;
00166   //cvMatMulAdd( pKalman->transition_matrix, pKalman->error_cov_post, 0, pKalman->temp1 );
00167   cvMatMulAdd( A_, P_, 0,temp1_ );
00168   cvMatMul(A_,P_21,P_21_pre);
00169   cvGEMM(P_12,A_,1,NULL,0,P_12_pre,CV_GEMM_B_T);
00170 
00171   /* P'(k) = temp1*At + Q */
00172 
00173   //cvGEMM( pKalman->temp1, pKalman->transition_matrix, 1, pKalman->process_noise_cov, 1,
00174   //                 pKalman->error_cov_pre, CV_GEMM_B_T );

00202   }

00205     cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate++,0,cvmGet(pDataCam->rotation,i,0));
00206   }
00207   cout<<"Before updateMatrizSize init_state"<<endl;
00208

00210 
00211   //grow(pMap->bbdd.size()-10);
00212   cout<<"after updateMatrizSize " <<endl;
00213 
00214   // inicializaci√≥n primeros puntos vistos
00215   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00216     {
00217       if((*It)->state==st_inited){
00218         cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate++,0,(*It)->wx);
00219         cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate++,0,(*It)->wy);
00220         cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate++,0,(*It)->wz);

00222         cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate++,0,(*It)->phi);

00233 void CKalman::setModel(CModel *p)
00234 {
00235 
00236   pModel = p;
00237 
00238   cout<<"getStateNum"<<pModel->getStateNum()<<endl;
00239   cout<<"getMeasurementNum"<<pModel->getMeasurementNum()<<endl;

00242             pModel->getMeasurementNum(),
00243             pModel->getInputNum());
00244 
00245   cout<<"mp "<<pKalman->MP<<" dp "<<pKalman->DP<<endl;
00246   if(pModel->getMeasurementNum()>0){
00247     measurement=cvCreateMat(pModel->getMeasurementNum(),1,CV_32FC1);
00248   }
00249   //    dim_measurement=2*10+pModel->getMeasurementNum();
00250   //    dim_state=3*10+pModel->getStateNum();
00251   cvSetIdentity( pKalman->transition_matrix);//, cvRealScalar(pptosBBDD->bbdd.size()*3+12) );
00252   transMat(pModel->getTransitionMatrix(),pKalman->transition_matrix);
00253 
00254   cvSetIdentity( pKalman->process_noise_cov, cvRealScalar(PROC_COV) );
00255   transMat(pModel->getProcessNoiseCov(),pKalman->process_noise_cov);
00256 
00257   if(pKalman->MP>0){
00258     cvSetIdentity( pKalman->measurement_matrix,cvRealScalar(0) );
00259       cvSetIdentity( pKalman->measurement_noise_cov, cvRealScalar(MEAS_COV) );
00260   }
00261   if(pModel->getMeasurementNum()!=0)
00262     {
00263       transMat(pModel->getMeasurementMatrix(),pKalman->measurement_matrix );
00264       transMat(pModel->getMeasurementNoiseCov(),pKalman->measurement_noise_cov );
00265     }
00266   //covarianza de la medida
00267 
00268   cvSetIdentity( pKalman->error_cov_post, cvRealScalar(MODEL_ERROR_COV));
00269   cvSetIdentity( pKalman->error_cov_pre, cvRealScalar(MODEL_ERROR_COV));
00270   //cvSetIdentity( pKalman->state_post, cvRealScalar(0));
00271   cout<<"end set param kalman"<<endl;
00272 
00273 }

00460         cvmSet(pKalman->measurement_matrix,i+pModel->getMeasurementNum(),j+pModel->getStateNum()+1,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,1));
00461         cvmSet(pKalman->measurement_matrix,i+pModel->getMeasurementNum(),j+pModel->getStateNum()+2,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,2));
00462         cvmSet(pKalman->measurement_matrix,i+pModel->getMeasurementNum(),j+pModel->getStateNum()+3,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,3));
00463         cvmSet(pKalman->measurement_matrix,i+pModel->getMeasurementNum(),j+pModel->getStateNum()+4,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,4));
00464         cvmSet(pKalman->measurement_matrix,i+pModel->getMeasurementNum(),j+pModel->getStateNum()+5,cvmGet((*It)->dpdw,1,5));
00465         i++;
00466         j+=fdims;
00467 
00468       }//end if inited
00469       else if((*It)->state==st_no_view){
00470         j+=fdims;
00471 
00472       }
00473     }
00474 
00475 }
00488 void CKalman::Correct()
00489 {
00490 
00491   UpdateJacob();
00492   cout<<"correction"<<endl;
00493 
00494 //  cout<<"1"<<endl;
00495   /* temp2 = H*P'(k) */
00496   cvMatMulAdd( pKalman->measurement_matrix,
00497                pKalman->error_cov_pre, 0, pKalman->temp2 );
00498   /* temp3 = temp2*Ht + R */
00499      cvGEMM( pKalman->temp2, pKalman->measurement_matrix, 1,
00500         pKalman->measurement_noise_cov, 1, pKalman->temp3, CV_GEMM_B_T );
00501 
00502     /* temp4 = inv(temp3)*temp2 = Kt(k) */
00503   cvSolve(pKalman->temp3, pKalman->temp2, pKalman->temp4, CV_SVD );
00504 //  cout<<"8"<<endl;
00505   /* K(k) */
00506   cvTranspose( pKalman->temp4, pKalman->gain );
00507 
00508   /* temp5 = z(k) - H*x'(k) */
00509 
00510   if(pModel->getMeasurementNum()!=0)
00511     {
00512       CvMat *tempmeas;
00513       tempmeas=pModel->getMeasurementVector();
00514       for(int kk=0;kk<pModel->getMeasurementNum();kk++)
00515         {
00516           cvmSet(measurement,kk,0,cvmGet(tempmeas,kk,0));
00517         }
00518           //            cvReleaseMat(&tempmeas);
00519     }
00520   int ii=pModel->getMeasurementNum();
00521   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00522     {
00523       if((*It)->state==st_inited){
00524         cvmSet(measurement,ii,0,(*It)->pto.x);
00525         ii++;
00526         cvmSet(measurement,ii,0,(*It)->pto.y);
00527         ii++;
00528       }
00529     }
00530 
00531   //FIXME esta parte se ejecuta pero solo tiene efecto cuando hay medida de movimiento de camara.
00532   if(pModel->getMeasurementNum()!=0)
00533     {
00534       cvGEMM( pKalman->measurement_matrix, pKalman->state_pre, -1, measurement, 1, pKalman->temp5 );
00535     }
00536 
00537   ii=pModel->getMeasurementNum();
00538   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00539     {
00540       if((*It)->state==st_inited){
00541         cout<<"linearidad--> "<<" Jacob x:"<< cvmGet(pKalman->temp5,ii,0)<<" y: ";
00542         cout<<cvmGet(pKalman->temp5,ii+1,0)<< " modelo x: "<<(*It)->pto.x-(*It)->projx;
00543         cout<<" y: "<<(*It)->pto.y-(*It)->projy<<endl;
00544         cvmSet(pKalman->temp5,ii,0,(*It)->pto.x-(*It)->projx);
00545         ii++;
00546         cvmSet(pKalman->temp5,ii,0,(*It)->pto.y-(*It)->projy);
00547         ii++;
00548       }
00549     }
00550 
00551   /* x(k) = x'(k) + K(k)*temp5 */
00552   cvMatMulAdd( pKalman->gain, pKalman->temp5, pKalman->state_pre, pKalman->state_post );
00553 
00554   /* P(k) = P'(k) - K(k)*temp2 */
00555   cvGEMM( pKalman->gain, pKalman->temp2, -1, pKalman->error_cov_pre, 1,
00556           pKalman->error_cov_post, 0 );
00557 
00558   int kstate=0;
00559   for(int i =0; i<3;i++){
00560     cvmSet(trans,i,0,cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,kstate++,0));
00561     kstate++;
00562   }
00563   for(int i =0; i<3;i++){
00564     cvmSet(rotation,i,0,cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,kstate++,0));
00565     kstate++;
00566   }
00567 
00568   pDataCam->SetRotation(rotation);
00569   pDataCam->SetTranslation(trans);
00570   cout<<"_trans "<<cvmGet(trans,0,0)<<" "<<cvmGet(trans,1,0)<<" "<<cvmGet(trans,1,0)<<endl;
00571   cout<<"translation "<<cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,0,0)<<" ";
00572   cout<< cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,1,0)<<" ";
00573   cout<< cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,2,0)<<" "<<endl;
00574 
00575   ii=pModel->getStateNum();
00576   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00577     {
00578       if((*It)->state==st_inited||(*It)->state==st_no_view)
00579         {
00580           (*It)->wx=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00581           (*It)->wx_s=cvmGet(pKalman->error_cov_post,ii,ii);
00582           ii++;
00583           (*It)->wy=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00584           (*It)->wy_s=cvmGet(pKalman->error_cov_post,ii,ii);
00585           ii++;
00586           (*It)->wz=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00587           (*It)->wz_s=cvmGet(pKalman->error_cov_post,ii,ii);
00588           ii++;
00589           (*It)->theta=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00590           ii++;
00591           (*It)->phi=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00592           ii++;
00593           (*It)->rho=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00594           ii++;
00595         }
00596     }
00597 
00598 
00599 }
00600 void CKalman::Correct_FAST()
00601 {
00602 
00603   UpdateJacob();
00604   cout<<"correction"<<endl;
00605   CvMat *Paa, *Haa;
00606   Paa = cvCreateMat((pKalman->MP/2)*fdims+pModel->getStateNum(),
00607                     (pKalman->MP/2)*fdims+pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);
00608   Haa = cvCreateMat(pKalman->MP,(pKalman->MP/2)*fdims+pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);//num_medidas/2*6
00609   int i_aa=0;
00610   int j_aa=0;
00611   bool cols[pKalman->DP];
00612   int i_c=0;
00613 //  cout<<"1"<<endl;
00615   for (int j=0 ; j<pModel->getStateNum();j++)
00616     {
00617       cols[i_c]=1;
00618       i_c++;
00619     }
00620 //  cout<<"2"<<endl;
00621   for (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00622     {
00623       if((*It)->state==st_inited){
00624         for (int j=0;j<fdims; j++)
00625           {
00626             cols[i_c]=1;
00627             i_c++;
00628           }
00629       }else if((*It)->state==st_no_view)
00630         {
00631           for (int j=0;j<fdims;j++)
00632             {
00633               cols[i_c]=0;
00634               i_c++;
00635             }
00636         }
00637 
00638     }
00639 //  cout<<"3"<<endl;
00641   for (int j=0;j< i_c; j++)
00642     {
00643       if (cols[j]==1)
00644         {
00645           for (int i=0; i<pKalman->MP;i++)
00646             {
00647               cvmSet(Haa,i,i_aa,cvmGet(pKalman->measurement_matrix,i,j));
00648             }
00649 
00650           i_aa++;
00651         }
00652     }
00653 //  cout<<"4"<<endl;
00654   i_aa=0;
00655   j_aa=0;
00656   for (int i=0; i<i_c; i++)
00657     {
00658       if(cols[i]==1)
00659         {
00660           j_aa=0;
00661           for (int j=0; j<i_c; j++)
00662             {
00663               if(cols[j]==1)
00664                 {
00665                   cvmSet(Paa,i_aa,j_aa,cvmGet(pKalman->error_cov_pre,i,j));
00666                   j_aa++;
00667                 }
00668             }
00669           i_aa++;
00670         }
00671     }
00672 //  cout<<"5"<<endl;
00673   /* t2 = Haa*Paa'(k) */
00674   CvMat *t2;
00675   t2=cvCreateMat(pKalman->MP,(pKalman->MP/2)*fdims+pModel->getStateNum(),CV_32FC1);//num_medidas/2*6
00676   cvMatMulAdd(Haa,Paa,0,t2);
00677 //  cout<<"6"<<endl;
00678   /* t3 = t2*Haa^t + R = Haa*Paa*Haa^t + R*/
00679   CvMat *t3;
00680   t3=cvCreateMat(pKalman->MP,pKalman->MP,CV_32FC1);
00681   cvGEMM(t2,Haa,1,pKalman->measurement_noise_cov,1,t3,CV_GEMM_B_T);
00682   //cout<<"7"<<endl;
00683   /* temp2 = H*P'(k) */
00684   cvMatMulAdd( pKalman->measurement_matrix,
00685                pKalman->error_cov_pre, 0, pKalman->temp2 );
00686   /* temp3 = temp2*Ht + R */
00687   /*    cvGEMM( pKalman->temp2, pKalman->measurement_matrix, 1,
00688         pKalman->measurement_noise_cov, 1, pKalman->temp3, CV_GEMM_B_T );*/
00689 
00690     /* temp4 = inv(temp3)*temp2 = Kt(k) */
00691   cvSolve( t3, pKalman->temp2, pKalman->temp4, CV_SVD );
00692 //  cout<<"8"<<endl;
00693   /* K(k) */
00694   cvTranspose( pKalman->temp4, pKalman->gain );
00695 
00696   /* temp5 = z(k) - H*x'(k) */
00697 
00698   if(pModel->getMeasurementNum()!=0)
00699     {
00700       CvMat *tempmeas;
00701       tempmeas=pModel->getMeasurementVector();
00702       for(int kk=0;kk<pModel->getMeasurementNum();kk++)
00703         {
00704           cvmSet(measurement,kk,0,cvmGet(tempmeas,kk,0));
00705         }
00706       //                cvReleaseMat(&tempmeas);
00707     }
00708   int ii=pModel->getMeasurementNum();
00709   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00710     {
00711       if((*It)->state==st_inited){
00712         cvmSet(measurement,ii,0,(*It)->pto.x);
00713         ii++;
00714         cvmSet(measurement,ii,0,(*It)->pto.y);
00715         ii++;
00716       }
00717     }
00718 
00719   //FIXME esta parte se ejecuta pero solo tiene efecto cuando hay medida de movimiento de camara.
00720   if(pModel->getMeasurementNum()!=0)
00721     {
00722       cvGEMM( pKalman->measurement_matrix, pKalman->state_pre, -1, measurement, 1, pKalman->temp5 );
00723     }
00724 
00725   ii=pModel->getMeasurementNum();
00726   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00727     {
00728       if((*It)->state==st_inited){
00729         cvmSet(pKalman->temp5,ii,0,(*It)->pto.x-(*It)->projx);
00730         ii++;
00731         cvmSet(pKalman->temp5,ii,0,(*It)->pto.y-(*It)->projy);
00732         ii++;
00733       }
00734     }
00735   cout<<"pto.x - projx "<<endl;
00736   for (int i=0 ; i<(pKalman->MP); i++)
00737     {
00738       for (int j=0;j<1;j++)
00739         {
00740           cout << cvmGet(pKalman->temp5, i,j)<<" ";
00741         }
00742       cout <<endl;
00743     }
00744 
00745   /*cout<<"measurement: "<<endl;
00746     for (int i=0; i<(pKalman->MP);i++)
00747     {
00748     cout<<" "<<cvmGet(measurement,i,0);
00749     }
00750     cout<<endl;*/
00751 
00752   /* x(k) = x'(k) + K(k)*temp5 */
00753   cvMatMulAdd( pKalman->gain, pKalman->temp5, pKalman->state_pre, pKalman->state_post );
00754 
00755   /* P(k) = P'(k) - K(k)*temp2 */
00756   cvGEMM( pKalman->gain, pKalman->temp2, -1, pKalman->error_cov_pre, 1,
00757           pKalman->error_cov_post, 0 );
00758 
00759 
00760   int kstate=0;
00761   for(int i =0; i<3;i++){
00762     cvmSet(trans,i,0,cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,kstate++,0));
00763     kstate++;
00764   }
00765   for(int i =0; i<3;i++){
00766     cvmSet(rotation,i,0,cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,kstate++,0));
00767     kstate++;
00768   }
00769 
00770   pDataCam->SetRotation(rotation);
00771   pDataCam->SetTranslation(trans);
00772   cout<<"_trans "<<cvmGet(trans,0,0)<<" "<<cvmGet(trans,1,0)<<" "<<cvmGet(trans,1,0)<<endl;
00773   cout<<"translation "<<cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,0,0)<<" ";
00774   cout<< cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,1,0)<<" ";
00775   cout<< cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,2,0)<<" "<<endl;
00776 
00777   ii=pModel->getStateNum();
00778   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00779     {
00780       if((*It)->state==st_inited||(*It)->state==st_no_view)
00781         {
00782           (*It)->wx=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00783           (*It)->wx_s=cvmGet(pKalman->error_cov_post,ii,ii);
00784           ii++;
00785           (*It)->wy=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00786           (*It)->wy_s=cvmGet(pKalman->error_cov_post,ii,ii);
00787           ii++;
00788           (*It)->wz=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00789           (*It)->wz_s=cvmGet(pKalman->error_cov_post,ii,ii);
00790           ii++;
00791           (*It)->theta=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00792           ii++;
00793           (*It)->phi=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00794           ii++;
00795           (*It)->rho=cvmGet(pKalman->state_post,ii,0);
00796           ii++;
00797         }
00798     }
00799   cvReleaseMat(&Paa);
00800   cvReleaseMat(&Haa);
00801   cvReleaseMat(&t2);
00802   cvReleaseMat(&t3);
00803 
00804   //    cvReleaseMat(&rotation);
00805   //    cvReleaseMat(&trans);
00806 
00807 }
00812 void CKalman::UpdateMatrixSize()
00813 {
00814 
00815   int inited_vis=0;
00816   int inited_no_vis=0;
00817 
00818   for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00819         It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00820     {
00821       if ((*It)->state==st_inited){
00822         inited_vis++;
00823       }
00824       if ((*It)->state==st_no_view){
00825         inited_no_vis++;
00826       }
00827     }
00828 
00829   int n=inited_vis*2+pModel->getMeasurementNum();
00830   int s=(inited_no_vis+inited_vis)*fdims+pModel->getStateNum();
00831   int oldDP,oldMP,oldCP;
00832   if (pKalman!=0){
00833     oldDP=pKalman->DP;
00834     oldMP=pKalman->MP;
00835     oldCP=pKalman->CP;
00836   }else {
00837     oldDP=0;//FIXME Quizas sea get estate num
00838     oldCP=0;
00839     oldMP=0;
00840   }
00841   //    int npoints=inited_vis-((oldDP-pModel->getStateNum())/fdims);
00842   int npoints=(s-oldDP)/fdims;
00843 
00844   SetKalman(pKalman,s,n,oldCP);
00845 
00846   cout<<"updateMatrixSize("<<n<<") "<<npoints<<endl;
00847 
00848   cvSetIdentity( pKalman->measurement_noise_cov, cvRealScalar(MEAS_COV) );
00849   if(pModel->getMeasurementNum()>0)
00850     {
00851             transMat(pModel->getMeasurementNoiseCov(),pKalman->measurement_noise_cov );
00852     }
00853 
00854   pKalman->MP=n;
00855   cvReleaseMat(&measurement);
00856   measurement=cvCreateMat( n,1,CV_32FC1);
00857 
00858   //anada datos nuevo parametro
00859   //FIXME COMPROBAR LO DE NUMERO DE PUNTOS >0 SE PUEDE REDUCIR LA MEDIDA Y QUE NO ME ENTER
00860   if (npoints>0){
00861     //transition_matrix
00862     //cout<<"0"<<endl;
00864     CvMat *submat;
00865     submat=cvCreateMatHeader(fdims*npoints,fdims*npoints,CV_32FC1 );
00866     if(oldDP==0)
00867     {
00868 //      cout<<"debate 2 oldDP "<<oldDP<<" getmeasnum "<<pModel->getStateNum()<<endl;
00869 //      cvGetSubRect(pKalman->transition_matrix, submat,
00870 //      cvRect(pModel->getStateNum(),pModel->getStateNum(),fdims*npoints,fdims*npoints));
00871     }else{
00872         cout<<"debate 1 oldDP "<<oldDP<<" getmeasnum "<<pModel->getMeasurementNum()<<endl;
00873         cvGetSubRect(pKalman->transition_matrix, submat,
00874                     cvRect(oldDP,oldDP,fdims*npoints,fdims*npoints));
00875         cvSetIdentity(submat,cvRealScalar(1));
00876         cvReleaseMatHeader(&submat);
00877     }
00878     //  cout<<"1"<<endl;
00879 
00880     //measurement_matrix
00885     cvSetIdentity(pKalman->measurement_matrix,cvRealScalar(0));
00887     if(pModel->getMeasurementNum()){
00888       transMat(pModel->getMeasurementMatrix(),pKalman->measurement_matrix);
00889     }
00890 
00891 //    cout<<"2"<<endl;
00892 
00894     //cvSetIdentity(pKalman->process_noise_cov,cvRealScalar(PROC_COV));
00895 
00896     submat=cvCreateMatHeader(fdims*npoints,fdims*npoints,CV_32FC1 );
00897     cvGetSubRect(pKalman->process_noise_cov, submat, cvRect(oldDP,oldDP,fdims*npoints,fdims*npoints));
00898     cvSetIdentity(submat,cvRealScalar(PROC_COV));
00899     cvReleaseMatHeader(&submat);
00900 
00901 //    for (int i =0; i<6; i++) cvmSet(pKalman->process_noise_cov,i,i,0.01);///FIXME NO LO PILLA DEL MODELO
00902 //    for (int i =17;i<fdims*npoints+pModel->getStateNum(); i+=6) cvmSet(pKalman->process_noise_cov,i,i,1);
00903 //    cout<<"3"<<endl;
00904 
00911     int startpoint=(oldDP-pModel->getStateNum())/fdims;
00912 /*
00913     submat=cvCreateMatHeader(fdims*npoints,fdims*npoints,CV_32FC1 );
00914     CvMat *submat2;
00915     CvMat *submat3;
00916     CvMat *jPos, *jPix,*jBig;
00917     CvMat *ptemp;
00918     CvMat *temp2;
00919     CvMat *ptemp2;
00920 
00921     submat2=cvCreateMatHeader(fdims*npoints,12,CV_32FC1 );
00922     submat3=cvCreateMatHeader(12,fdims*npoints,CV_32FC1 );
00923 
00924     cvGetSubRect(pKalman->error_cov_post, submat, cvRect(oldDP,oldDP,fdims*npoints,fdims*npoints));
00925     cvGetSubRect(pKalman->error_cov_post, submat2, cvRect(0,oldDP,12,fdims*npoints));
00926     cvGetSubRect(pKalman->error_cov_post, submat3, cvRect(oldDP,0,fdims*npoints,12));
00927

00929

00931     jPix=cvCreateMat(6,2,CV_32FC1);
00932     jBig=cvCreateMat(12,9,CV_32FC1);
00933     ptemp=cvCreateMat(9,9,CV_32FC1);
00934     temp2=cvCreateMat(12,9,CV_32FC1);
00935     ptemp2=cvCreateMat(12,12,CV_32FC1);
00936 
00937     cvSetIdentity(ptemp,cvRealScalar(0));
00938     cvSetIdentity(jBig,cvRealScalar(0));
00939 
00940 
00941     for(int i=0; i<6; i++)
00942       for(int j=0; j<6;j++)
00943         cvmSet(ptemp,i,j,cvmGet(pKalman->error_cov_post,2*i,2*j));
00944 
00945     cvmSet(ptemp,6,6,4);//covarianza del error de localizaciÛn de un pixel
00946     cvmSet(ptemp,7,7,4);//covarianza del error de localizaciÛn de un pixel
00947     cvmSet(ptemp,8,8,0.5);//covarianza de rho
00948 
00949     int id=0;
00950     int start=0;
00951     for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00952       {
00953         if ((*It)->state>=st_inited){
00954           if (start<startpoint) start++;
00955           else {
00956             pModelCam->getJInit(jPos,jPix,(*It)->pto);
00957             cvSetIdentity(jBig,cvRealScalar(1));
00958 
00959             for(int i=0; i<6; i++)
00960               for(int j=0; j<6;j++)
00961                 cvmSet(jBig,6+i,j,cvmGet(jPos,i,j));//derivada de feature respecto pos
00962 
00963             for(int i=0; i<6; i++)
00964               for(int j=0; j<2;j++)
00965                 cvmSet(jBig,6+i,6+j,cvmGet(jPix,i,j));//derivada de feature respecto de pix
00966 
00967             cvmSet(jBig,11,8,1);//derivada de rho respecto de rho
00968 
00969             cvMatMul(jBig,ptemp,temp2);
00970             cvGEMM(temp2,jBig,1,NULL,0,ptemp2,CV_GEMM_B_T);
00971             for(int i=0; i<6; i++)
00972               for(int j=0; j<6;j++){
00973                 cvmSet(submat,id*fdims+i,id*fdims+j,cvmGet(ptemp2,6+i,6+j));
00974                 cvmSet(submat2,id*fdims+i,j*2,cvmGet(ptemp2,6+i,j));
00975                 cvmSet(submat3,i*2,id*fdims+j,cvmGet(ptemp2,i,6+j));
00976               }
00977             id++;
00978           }//end else if star>start
00979         }//end if >inited
00980       }//end iter
00981 
00982 
00983     cvReleaseMatHeader(&submat);
00984     cvReleaseMatHeader(&submat2);
00985     cvReleaseMatHeader(&submat3);
00986     cvReleaseMat(&jPos);
00987     cvReleaseMat(&jPix);
00988     cvReleaseMat(&jBig);
00989     cvReleaseMat(&ptemp);
00990     cvReleaseMat(&temp2);
00991     cvReleaseMat(&ptemp2);*/
00992 
00993 
00994     int estado_recorrido=oldDP;
00995     int start=0;
00996     CvMat *h=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00997     for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00998     {
00999         if ((*It)->state>=st_inited){
01000           if (start<startpoint) start++;
01001           else {
01002                 cvmSet(h,0,0,cos((*It)->theta)*sin((*It)->phi));
01003                 cvmSet(h,1,0,-sin((*It)->theta));
01004                 cvmSet(h,2,0,cos((*It)->theta)*cos((*It)->phi));
01005                 cvNormalize( h,h);
01006                 
01007                 NewPointCov(estado_recorrido,h,(*It)->pto.x,(*It)->pto.y);
01008                 estado_recorrido+=6;
01009           }
01010         }
01011     }
01012     cvReleaseMat(&h);
01013     //error_cov_pre
01016     submat=cvCreateMatHeader(fdims*npoints,fdims*npoints,CV_32FC1 );
01017     cvGetSubRect(pKalman->error_cov_pre, submat, cvRect(oldDP,oldDP,fdims*npoints,fdims*npoints));
01018     cvSetIdentity(submat,cvRealScalar(ERROR_COV));
01019     cvReleaseMatHeader(&submat);
01020 //    cout<<"5"<<endl;
01021 
01022 
01023   }//end if npoints >0
01024 
01025   //    state_post=wx wy wz
01026   int kstate=pModel->getStateNum();
01027   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
01028     {
01029       if((*It)->state==st_inited||(*It)->state==st_no_view){
01030         cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate,0,(*It)->wx);
01031         kstate++;
01032         cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate,0,(*It)->wy);
01033         kstate++;
01034         cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate,0,(*It)->wz);
01035         kstate++;
01036         cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate,0,(*It)->theta);
01037         kstate++;
01038         cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate,0,(*It)->phi);
01039         kstate++;
01040         cvmSet(pKalman->state_post,kstate,0,(*It)->rho);
01041         kstate++;
01042       }
01043     }
01044 }
01045 
01051 void CKalman::transMat(CvMat* o_mat, CvMat* d_mat)
01052 {
01053   CvMat *submat;
01054   submat=cvCreateMatHeader( o_mat->rows,o_mat->cols,CV_32FC1 );
01055   cvGetSubRect( d_mat, submat, cvRect(0, 0, o_mat->cols, o_mat->rows));
01056   cvCopy( o_mat, submat );
01057   cvReleaseMatHeader(&submat);
01058 }

01067   pKalman->DP = state;
01068   pKalman->MP = meas;
01069   pKalman->CP = input;
01070   cout<<"state "<<state<<" meas "<<meas<<" input "<<input<<endl;
01071 
01072 
01073   /*    CV_CALL( kalman->state_pre = cvCreateMat( DP, 1, CV_32FC1 ));
01074         cvZero( kalman->state_pre );*/
01075   pKalman->state_pre = cvCreateMatHeader( state, 1, CV_32FC1 );
01076   cvGetSubRect(pKalmanMem->state_pre,pKalman->state_pre,
01077                cvRect(0, 0, 1,state));
01078   //    CV_CALL( kalman->state_post = cvCreateMat( DP, 1, CV_32FC1 ));
01079   pKalman->state_post = cvCreateMatHeader( state, 1, CV_32FC1 );
01080   cvGetSubRect(pKalmanMem->state_post,pKalman->state_post,
01081                cvRect(0, 0, 1,state));
01082   //    CV_CALL( kalman->transition_matrix = cvCreateMat( DP, DP, CV_32FC1 ));
01083   pKalman->transition_matrix = cvCreateMatHeader( state, state, CV_32FC1 );
01084   cvGetSubRect(pKalmanMem->transition_matrix,pKalman->transition_matrix,
01085                cvRect(0, 0, state,state));

01091     cvGetSubRect(pKalmanMem->control_matrix,pKalman->control_matrix,
01092                  cvRect(0, 0, input,state));
01093   }else{
01094       pKalman->control_matrix=0;
01095   }
01096   //  CV_CALL( kalman->measurement_matrix = cvCreateMat( MP, DP, CV_32FC1 ));

01099     cvGetSubRect(pKalmanMem->measurement_matrix,pKalman->measurement_matrix,
01100                  cvRect(0, 0, state,meas));

01111   }

01114   cvGetSubRect(pKalmanMem->error_cov_pre,pKalman->error_cov_pre,

01155 void CKalman::NewPointCov(int old_state,CvMat *h,int xpix,int ypix)
01156 {
01157     CvMat *dm_dt,*dm_dr,*dm_dpix;
01158     double h0=cvmGet(h,0,0);
01159     double h1=cvmGet(h,1,0);
01160     double h2=cvmGet(h,2,0);
01161     dm_dt=cvCreateMat(6,3,CV_32FC1);
01162     dm_dr=cvCreateMat(6,3,CV_32FC1);
01163     dm_dpix=cvCreateMat(6,2,CV_32FC1);
01164 
01166     cvSetIdentity(dm_dt,cvRealScalar(0));
01167     for (int i =0; i<3;i++) cvmSet(dm_dt,i,i,1);
01168     
01170     CvMat *dTh_dh=cvCreateMat(1,3,CV_32FC1);
01171     double d=h0*h0+h2*h2;
01172     double k=1/sqrt(1+(-h1/sqrt(d)));
01173     cvmSet(dTh_dh,0,0,k*h1*h0/sqrt(d*d*d));
01174     cvmSet(dTh_dh,0,1,k*-1/sqrt(d));
01175     cvmSet(dTh_dh,0,2,k*h1*h2/sqrt(d*d*d));
01176     
01177     CvMat *dPh_dh=cvCreateMat(1,3,CV_32FC1);
01178     double k2=1/sqrt(1+(h0/h2)*(h0/h2));
01179     cvmSet(dPh_dh,0,0,k2/h2);
01180     cvmSet(dPh_dh,0,1,0);
01181     cvmSet(dPh_dh,0,2,k2*(-h0)/(h2*h2));
01182 
01183     CvMat *dh_dr=cvCreateMat(3,3,CV_32FC1);
01184     CvMat *RotMat = cvCreateMat(3,3,CV_32FC1);
01185     CvMat *RotJ=cvCreateMat(9,3,CV_32FC1);
01186     cvRodrigues2(pDataCam->rotation, RotMat,RotJ);
01187     CvMat *RotJ_dr0=cvCreateMatHeader(3,3,CV_32FC1);
01188     CvMat *RotJ_dr1=cvCreateMatHeader(3,3,CV_32FC1);
01189     CvMat *RotJ_dr2=cvCreateMatHeader(3,3,CV_32FC1);
01190     cvGetSubRect(RotJ,RotJ_dr0,cvRect(0, 0, 3,3));
01191     cvGetSubRect(RotJ,RotJ_dr1,cvRect(0, 3, 3,3));
01192     cvGetSubRect(RotJ,RotJ_dr2,cvRect(0, 6, 3,3));
01193     
01194 
01195     CvMat *InvF =cvCreateMat(3,3,CV_32FC1);
01196     cvInv(pDataCam->calibration, InvF);
01197     CvMat *Pix=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
01198     cvmSet(Pix,0,0,xpix);
01199     cvmSet(Pix,1,0,ypix);
01200     cvmSet(Pix,2,0,1);
01201 
01202     CvMat *temp= cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
01203     cvGEMM(InvF,Pix,1,NULL,0,temp,0);
01204     CvMat *dh_dr0=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
01205     cvGEMM(RotJ_dr0,temp,1,NULL,0,dh_dr0,0);    
01206     CvMat *dh_dr1=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
01207     cvGEMM(RotJ_dr1,temp,1,NULL,0,dh_dr1,0);    
01208     CvMat *dh_dr2=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
01209     cvGEMM(RotJ_dr2,temp,1,NULL,0,dh_dr2,0);    
01210     for (int i =0 ; i<3;i++){
01211         cvmSet(dh_dr,i,0,cvmGet(dh_dr0,i,0));
01212         cvmSet(dh_dr,i,1,cvmGet(dh_dr1,i,0));
01213         cvmSet(dh_dr,i,2,cvmGet(dh_dr2,i,0));
01214     }
01215 
01216     CvMat *dTh_dr = cvCreateMat(1,3,CV_32FC1);
01217     CvMat *dPh_dr = cvCreateMat(1,3,CV_32FC1);
01218     cvGEMM(dTh_dh,dh_dr,1,NULL,0,dTh_dr,0);
01219     cvGEMM(dPh_dh,dh_dr,1,NULL,0,dPh_dr,0);
01220     
01222     CvMat *dh_dpix_ =cvCreateMat(3,3,CV_32FC1);//Aunque es de 3x3 solo se usa las 2 1∫ cols.
01223     CvMat *dh_dpix =cvCreateMatHeader(3,2,CV_32FC1);
01224     cvGetSubRect(dh_dpix_,dh_dpix,cvRect(0, 0, 2,3));//Aunque es de 3x3 solo se usa las 2 1∫ cols.
01225 
01226     cvGEMM(pDataCam->rotMat,InvF,1,NULL,0,dh_dpix_,CV_GEMM_A_T);
01227 
01228     CvMat *dTh_dpix=cvCreateMat(1,2,CV_32FC1);
01229     cvGEMM(dTh_dh,dh_dpix,1,NULL,0,dTh_dpix,0);
01230 
01231     CvMat *dPh_dpix=cvCreateMat(1,2,CV_32FC1);
01232     cvGEMM(dPh_dh,dh_dpix,1,NULL,0,dPh_dpix,0);
01233     
01235     CvMat *Jacob = cvCreateMat(old_state+fdims,old_state+3,CV_32FC1);
01236     cvSetIdentity(Jacob,cvRealScalar(0));
01237     //inserto P_old
01238     for (int i =0; i<old_state;i++)
01239         cvmSet(Jacob,i,i,1);//sub-matriz identidad
01240     //inserto dm_dt
01241     for (int i =0; i<3;i++)
01242         for (int j = 0; j<6; j++){
01243             cvmSet(Jacob,j+old_state,2*i,cvmGet(dm_dt,j,i));
01244         }
01245 
01246     //inserto dm_dr
01247     for (int i =0; i<3;i++){
01248          cvmSet(Jacob,old_state+3,2*i+6,cvmGet(dTh_dr,0,i));
01249          cvmSet(Jacob,old_state+4,2*i+6,cvmGet(dPh_dr,0,i));
01250     }
01251 
01252     //inserto dh_dpix
01253     for (int i =0; i<2;i++){
01254         cvmSet(Jacob,old_state+3,old_state+i,cvmGet(dTh_dpix,0,i));
01255         cvmSet(Jacob,old_state+4,old_state+i,cvmGet(dPh_dpix,0,i));
01256     }
01257 
01258     //inserto dh_drho=1
01259     cvmSet(Jacob,old_state+fdims-1,old_state+3-1,1);
01261     CvMat *temp_cov =cvCreateMat(old_state+3,old_state+3,CV_32FC1);
01262     cvSetIdentity(temp_cov,cvRealScalar(0));
01263     for (int i =0; i<old_state;i++)
01264         for(int j =0; j<old_state;j++)
01265             cvmSet(temp_cov,j,i,cvmGet(pKalman->error_cov_post,j,i));
01266     cvmSet(temp_cov,old_state,old_state,4);//error de determinacion de un pixel
01267     cvmSet(temp_cov,old_state+1,old_state+1,4);//error de determinaciÛn de un pixel
01268     cvmSet(temp_cov,old_state+2,old_state+2,0.3);//sigma rho cuadrado
01269     CvMat *temp_cov2 =cvCreateMat(old_state+fdims,old_state+3,CV_32FC1);
01270     cvGEMM(Jacob,temp_cov,1,NULL,0,temp_cov2,0);
01271 
01272     CvMat *state_post=cvCreateMatHeader(old_state+fdims,old_state+fdims,CV_32FC1);
01273     cvGetSubRect(pKalman->error_cov_post,state_post,cvRect(0, 0, old_state+fdims,old_state+fdims));
01274 
01275     cvGEMM(temp_cov2,Jacob,1,NULL,0,state_post,CV_GEMM_B_T);
01276     cvReleaseMat(&temp_cov);
01277     cvReleaseMat(&temp_cov2);
01278     cvReleaseMat(&Jacob);
01279     cvReleaseMatHeader(&dh_dpix);
01280     cvReleaseMat(&dh_dpix_);
01281     cvReleaseMat(&dPh_dpix);
01282     cvReleaseMat(&dTh_dpix);
01283     cvReleaseMat(&dTh_dr);
01284     cvReleaseMat(&dTh_dr);
01285     cvReleaseMat(&dh_dr);
01286     cvReleaseMat(&dPh_dh);
01287     cvReleaseMat(&dTh_dh);
01288     cvReleaseMat(&dm_dt);
01289     cvReleaseMat(&dm_dr);
01290     cvReleaseMat(&dm_dpix);
01291         
01292 }
